titleStmt.title: Of the newe la[n]des and of ye people founde by the messengers of the kynge of porty[n]gale named Emanuel Of the. x. dyuers nacyons crystened. Of pope Iohn̄ and his landes, and of the costely keyes and wonders molodyes that in that lande is.

publicationStmt.publisher: Emprenteth by me Iohn̄ of Doesborowe,

notesStmt.note: Contains the putative first appearance of the name "America" in a book in English, p. A2r.
Printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Signatures: A⁶ B⁴ C⁴ D⁶ E⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
